title: Christopher Columbus: Why he doesn’t deserve his own national holiday
text:
Christopher Columbus: Why he doesn’t deserve his own national holiday 
Published By: BGR.com - Today 
Every year, children across the country are taught about the great adventurer that was Christopher Columbus. Famously sailing the ocean blue...
